name: Joint Energy
description:
You Created a Dimensional crack and now need to bring it to the Center of the Universe.

You need to solve an Interesting Puzzle on your way.

Controls:

  • You move the Player with [W A S D] 
  • You can Respawn with [R]

How to Install: 

  1. First Install the "Joined with Energy.zip" File.
  2. Then Right-Click the File in the File Explorer and Press "Extract all".
  3. Choose the Folder where u want to save it.
  4. Go in the Folder and double-click the "GTMK Game Jam 2021.exe" File.
  5. Have Fun 😁👍

By Next Legacy and El_Tigere
